channel.title: Door Problem
channel.description:
how can let some doors go open if you click on them.. please help me.
If i click on some doors they dont open so how can i get them open if i click on them?
Please replay and thnqz for the replay

item.title: Door Problem
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

well,
i fix it with this

if (objectID == **) // for more ids make it (objectID == ** || objectID == **) { ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID =+ 2, 0); }
** = id of the object (door, gate, wall… ID)

put that somewhere in case 132: from your
public void parseincomingpackets

now doors will open
